name: Yiran Table Lamp - Dijon Yellow
description: Our Yiran Table Lamp's name is inspired by the Mandarin phrase yí rán, meaning joyful, happy and bright. We like to think that the Dijon yellow tones and high gloss finish of this lamp will bring a joyful atmosphere into homes. Its antique glaze is fired at a high temperature which results in individual characteristics from piece to piece and a dipped look which lends it rustic appeal. The porcelain base features the head of an auspicious beast that's regarded as benevolent, powerful, worshipful and lucky.
